column4: I have a panasonic dvd ram multi drive that will not burn in Jaunty (ubuntu) I burn coasters and don't know why
I have a funny story!  I thought my combo drive was a cd-r/dvd-r when I looked it was just dvd-rom :/.  Do you use dvd+r or dvd-r?
could be the disks are they dvd-rw?
are they CD-rw disks?  People have reported problems with the -rw.
can't think of the name of it - but the package had to do with cd data formats
cdrdao is one of them to add
hmm....what program are you using to burn cd's?
I didn't know nero had a linux version?
did you try the default burner in Gnome?
go to the tools menu in the burner and should be an option there to burn image
if it is Brasero - last button on the left side, bottom
If its gnomebaker - its under tools
sorry, in Brasero its the last button on the left side of the window "Burn Image"
are you seeing it down the left side of the window, not menu bar
